question: [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-crypto/src/slh_dsa_sha2_128s/slh_dsa_keys.rs] [Function: PrivateKey::to_bytes()] [Key Material Leakage] Does the serialization function at lines 60-65 exclude the PK root as claimed, or could a memory alignment issue cause the full internal key material to be leaked when serialized, potentially exposing the 32-byte public key root that should remain internal?
